text: eeth 1873 di athlanthik sagarayen mathuwu, thawamath abirahasakwa pawathina, amuthuma golakara wasthun wisheshayak thiyenawa.

me athara siya niwaduwa gatha kirima sandaha ostreliyawe sita shri lankawa wetha pamini lankika tharuniyak kiya sitiye thaman kithunu bhakthikayeku wuwath wenath aagamika sthana desada gaurawayen baliya yuthu bawaya.

rohalakata adala paribhogika aarakshanaya, roginge himikam saha adhyapanaya, aushadha kalamanakaranaya, aasadana palanaya, pahasukamwala surakshithabhawaya, puhunuwa wani anga aawaranaya karamin, jathika ha jathyanthara pramithinta anukula nirnayaka wadidiyunu kirima ee yatathe sidu kirimata niyamithaya.
me athara ejapaya pasupela manthriwarun thawath kihipa denakuta rajya ha niyojya amathidhura labadime yojanawak idiripathwa athi bawada pawase.
dan dedena tharagayata ayath samaga bara kathawaya.
me thathwaya thula, wimal wirawansha wani apathayan samaga sahawasayakata, thissa witharana wanneku da aanduwe madhya sandarshanaya thula karagasa sitima kanagatuwa danawannaki.
eeth janatha apeksha itu nokirima nisayi aanduwa parajayata pathwune.

anika yatath wenna aapu nadesange birida athulu pirisa bade bomba badagena aawa kiyala bos kiyanne mona sadhaka thiyagenada kiyala kiyamuda balanna.mama kiwe methana prashne oya film ekak balanawa wage newa meka balanne.dushtaya dushtayama thamayi bosta.sudu kodiyak aran yatathwenna asarana wela enakota eekawath piliganna lasthi naha.oya aawata bade bomba athi kiyala hitha hadagannawa.
ithin thiraya matha dis wena yathuru puwaruwak ho bothamak ebimata mewa bahulawama yoda gannewa.
ohu sewima sadaha me wana wita wishesha polis kandayamak yodawa athi athara ohu ratin pana giye da yanna da soya balagena yanu labayi.
jalashayata para watunama sancharaka kalapayak lesa me pradeshaya diyunuwenawa.
ee kiyanne meya hithamatha ma ella kara praharayak.
ehema ahuwata passe eeka man ahapu aluth deyak nisa wadidura wisthara api eyagen ahuwa.

ema dura gamanedi ayata thuwala kihipayak da siduwu namuth ema mahangu ෙswaya gana nirmala da wanajiwi niladharihu da mahath sathutata pathwuha.ema siddhiyen pasu odisha ha ee asala pihiti pranthawalata kadawadina wana ali yali wanagatha kirima sandaha nirmalage pihita labaganima siduwe.pasugiya wasara 10 athulatha minis jiwitha 80k da 200k pamana ali athun da ali minis gatum nisa maranayata pathwi athayi parisara amathyanshaya mangin nikuth kala niwedanayaka dakwe.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha

api godak welawata suba katayuththakata gedarin pitath wenakota rahu kalaya, maru sitina dishawa suba welawal oya eki meki noki dewal balala eliyata bahinne.ehema eliyata bassath parata enakota dakina kena anuwa suba asuba pala thiranaya karanna uthsaha gannawa.
api jiwath wenne sahithyayata, kalawata thana nathi rataka.

aparadha wadiwimata balapana hethu widyathmakawa soya balanna oona.nathiwa wadawasam bhithiyakin samajaya thrastha karana rajanduwadayak neweyi awashya.api jiwath wenne 21 wani siyawase.idiriyedi molaye mostharayan kalin hadunagena prathikara karana thakshanayan pawa eyi.ellum gaha kiyanne siyalu prashna wisadana kap rukak noweyi.mlechchathwaye sankethaya misak

amir ali mahatha jathika layisthu manthriwarayaku washayen path kirima sandaha jathika layisthu manthriwariyaka wana malini fonseka mahathmiya sandhana nayakayange illima anuwa illa aswuwaya.

jathika layisthu manthri dhura 29k bihi kale,ratata kirthiyak ath kara dena widwathun 29k parlimenthuwa niyojanayata awakasha salasa dimataya.eheth,ada mathiwarana walin janatha manapaya nolaba parajayata path apekshakayin bath balayan lesa 'jathika layisthuwa' dushanaya karamin parlimenthuwata pamina thama bath bala wuwamanawan wenuwen katha pawathwannata gos siyalla awul kara damathi.mulika warada parajitha,janathawagen pilikul bhawayata path apekshakayin jathika layisthuwen parlimenthuwata path karagena owunta mada katha pawathwannata ida prastha salasa dena nayakayingeya.
jathiwadaya yanu jathika saha samajiya diyunuwata athi pradhanathama badhawak bawa ehi adahasayi.
wena karanna deyak nathi nisa wipakshaya samahara madhya allagena boru liyagannawa.sudussata thamata kalahaki de sandaha rajaya hama witama udaw karanawa.

thama janadhipathi dhurayata pathkirimata rawi karunanayaka mahatha dakwu dayakathwaya sihipathkara athi janadhipathiwaraya, shrilanipa amathiwarun rawi karunanayaka mahathata digin digatama pahara dunahoth eya eksath jathika pakshikayin waradawa wataha ganimata ida athi bawath aanduwe pawathmata tharjanayak wiya haki bawath penwa di thibe.
